articles.title: Goa nightclub fire victim kin seek death sentence for co - owners
articles.summary: Families of the 25 people killed in the massive fire at a nightclub in Goa staged a protest at Jantar Mantar on Sunday, demanding justice and a death sentence for those responsible for the tragedy. articles.title: Samsung chief stock wealth doubles amid Kospi rally
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Chair Lee Jae-yong (Joint Press Corps) Samsung Electronics Chair Lee Jae-yong has set a new historical benchmark for stock-based wealth, as his equity valuation more than doubled over the past year on the back of a broad market re-rating tied to the Kospi's rise above 4,000.
